Package org.apache.wayang.core.function

Class FunctionDescriptor

java.lang.Object
org.apache.wayang.core.function.FunctionDescriptor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AggregationDescriptor, ConsumerDescriptor, FlatMapDescriptor, MapPartitionsDescriptor, PredicateDescriptor, ReduceDescriptor, TransformationDescriptor
public abstract class FunctionDescriptor extends Object implements Serializable
A function operates on single data units or collections of those.
See Also:

    • setLoadEstimators

      public void setLoadEstimators(LoadEstimator cpuEstimator, LoadEstimator ramEstimator)
      Deprecated.
      Use setLoadProfileEstimator(LoadProfileEstimator) instead.
      Updates the LoadProfileEstimator of this instance.
      Parameters:
      cpuEstimator - the LoadEstimator for the CPU load
      ramEstimator - the LoadEstimator for the RAM load
